channel.title: Website on Alestrio
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Alestrio

item.title: Create a static website with Github Pages and Hugo
item.description: During the last two years, I studied Networks and Telecommunications at the IUT of Ch√¢lons-en-Champagne. Among the skills I acquired, there are, of course, technical skills but also communication skills. During my third year project, I was asked to replace the traditional paper project report by a static website, whose vocation was also to serve as a documentation of the project production. In this case, to convey a message, it’s not the point to make an ultra well done website, with animations everywhere but very heavy.
